name: Neckdeep
description:
Save your dog! "Neckdeep" is a virtual-computer adventure game where you must email your way to victory. Descend into the depths of a heartless bureaucracy to save your best friend.

Made for Ludum Dare 48

Need a Hint?  Email: help@moi.org (IN THE GAME NOT IN REAL LIFE!)

IMPORTANT:  Ctrl + C/Ctrl + V are very useful in this game!
